column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 2755.1 points on November 28, 2008 representing a decrease of 130.50 pts points (-4.52%), as compared to  2885.6 points on October 31, 2008 . During the month of November 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 3240.55 points on November 05, 2008 before closing at 2755.1 points on November 28, 2008 . The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty decreased from Rs.1785998 crores on October 31, 2008, to Rs.1706209 crores on November 28, 2008 i.e. a decrease of Rs.79789crores (-4.47%)
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-December-2007 to 30-November-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-November-2008 to 30-November-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 50 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
